item.title: Help plz help ill make u admin if u can tell me how to put server online
item.dc:creator: @Random666 Random666
item.description:
@Random666 wrote:

Just type your gateway ip in the address bar. When it comes up, go to gaming and applications and add port: 43594. Thats pretty much all you have to do to port-forward

item.title: Help plz help ill make u admin if u can tell me how to put server online
item.dc:creator: @Random666 Random666
item.description:
@Random666 wrote:

omg now its online but when i post on status page it says its offline help now?
Did you register your server? [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com:64/serverstatus.php?action=register]http://www.moparisthebest.com:64/serverstatus.php?action=register[/url]

If it still doesn’t work don’t worry. As long as people can enter you server it doesn’t matter. Just advertise your server somewhere

Read full topic

item.source: Help plz help ill make u admin if u can tell me how to put server online

item.title: Help plz help ill make u admin if u can tell me how to put server online
item.dc:creator: @Random666 Random666
item.description:
@Random666 wrote:

You probably have a different version of JDK than the compiler your using has. Right click compiler and click edit. Find where it says the directory and change whatever you need to. Imo don’t use those “perfect compilers”.
Here’s a short simple one:

@echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Change the directory to whatever directory you put your JDK in

Read full topic
item.source: Help plz help ill make u admin if u can tell me how to put server online

item.title: Help plz help ill make u admin if u can tell me how to put server online
item.dc:creator: @andynerd andynerd
item.description:
@andynerd wrote:

I was having the same problem to changing the compiler to this [code]@echo off
COLOR 04
cls
:menu
title Runserver + yoooo
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo yooooo
echo This Is Designed To Compile Clients and Servers.
echo.
echo c - Compile your server.
echo r - To run your server.
echo e - To exit out of the program.
echo.
echo.
set /p compile=Option:
if %compile%==c goto compile
if %compile%==C goto compile
if %compile%==r goto run
if %compile%==R goto run
if %compile%==e goto end
if %compile%==E goto end
if %compile#==* goto error
goto error
:compile
cls
title Compiler
if defined javac (goto compile2) else (goto checkjavac)
:compile2
if exist *.java (goto compile3) else (goto compileerror)
:compile3
%javac% -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto menu
:compileerror
cls
echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:run
cls
title Runserver
if exist .\server.class (goto run2) else (goto servererror)
:run2
set java=java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar
cls
goto run3
:run3
%java% server
pause
cls
goto menu
:servererror
cls
title Error
echo You Do Not Have A Server.Class Please Get One!
echo Compile Before You Run it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:end
cls
exit
:checkjavac
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2)
:checkjavac2
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3)
:checkjavac3
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4)
:checkjavac4
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5)
:checkjavac5
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6)
:checkjavac6
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac6) else (goto checkjavac7)
:checkjavac7
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac7) else (goto checkjavac8)
:checkjavac8
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac8) else (goto checkjavac9)
:checkjavac9
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac9) else (goto checkjavac10)
:checkjavac10
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac10) else (goto checkjavac11)
:checkjavac11
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac11) else (goto checkjavac12)
:checkjavac12
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac12) else (goto javacerror)
:setjavac
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac2
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac3
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac4
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac5
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac6
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac7
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac8
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac9
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac10
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac11
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac12
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:javacerror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0.
echo Give The Credits To Killer 99 For This Compiler
echo the newest JDK Update.
pause
cls
goto menu

[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 02:20:30 PM[/size][hr]@echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

this is a simpler one that worked for me

Read full topic
